WRITING.TITLE: Is there a Pokemon Red/Blue Fan Maker Software?
WRITING.TEXT: I'm trying to find one of those Pokemon RPG Maker software for a short comedy video on youtube. I'm looking for one where you can create a custom world from the original black and white games. Can anyone point me in the right direction (if this makes any sense at all)
sheogorath Thanks for the response and that's not a bad idea, I forgot about skooma. I'll give that series a watch as well thanks.

WRITING.TITLE: Oblivion Live Action Video Ideas? (Comedy)
WRITING.TEXT:
I'm a filmmaker that loves the elder scrolls series and wanted to make a very short comedy video about oblivion specifically.
I have access to a big forest and a couple actors but not a lot of great ideas. I have a guard outfit and was thinking of an idea revolving around criminal scum.
Do any of you guys have any ideas that could utilise a forest?
(I'll be sure to give you 100% credit if we end up using it. I also don't do this for profit, it's just good fun)
Thanks for the feedback bro I appreciate it and thank you for subbing
damn this has gone off the tracks completely
